It's that kind of curiosity we deal with. We can create animals according to our customers' wishes.

Looks like someone's had a selectively bred face.

Oh!

Even this sort of artificial selection is similar to the process of change I’ve been thinking about.

But

the process

I’m thinking about

is one in which humans don’t interfere,

a type of selection process that comes

about naturally,

a natural selection

of sorts.

Indeed, from now on I’ll call this theory “Natural Selection.”
